Check a nearby room."},{"lineNumber":262138,"originalJapaneseLine":"なにもない","translatedEnglishLine":"There's nothing."},{"lineNumber":262139,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ・・しかたない、１階に戻るか","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch... can't be helped, let's go back to the first floor."},{"lineNumber":262140,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが肉塊の部屋に到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance arrives at the room with the mass of flesh."},{"lineNumber":262141,"originalJapaneseLine":"先の情報でこの肉塊がパイアールの姉、ルートという事が分かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"From previous information, it is known that this mass of flesh is Paiarl's sister, Loutr."},{"lineNumber":262142,"originalJapaneseLine":"この肉塊を人質、肉質にとってパイアールを脅迫する訳か","translatedEnglishLine":"They are taking this flesh mass as hostage and blackmailing Paiarl with the person."},{"lineNumber":262143,"originalJapaneseLine":"あいつにとっては命より大事な物だろうからな","translatedEnglishLine":"For him, it's probably something more important than his life."},{"lineNumber":262144,"originalJapaneseLine":"魂は完全に維持されている、すごい事だ","translatedEnglishLine":"The soul is completely preserved, which is amazing."},{"lineNumber":262145,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミラクルが持っていた魔導具ＩＰボディで戻せるかもという（伏線、シィルがコレ）","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s a possibility of restoring it with the magical device IP Body that Miracle had (foreshadowing, this is the one Seal has)."},{"lineNumber":262146,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを使ってルートを再生させる","translatedEnglishLine":"Using that, they regenerate Loutr."},{"lineNumber":262147,"originalJapaneseLine":"病気は治っていないが、元の身体に戻るルート","translatedEnglishLine":"Though the illness is not cured, Loutr returns to her original body."},{"lineNumber":262148,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何百年前の生命であるルートだが、元に戻った","translatedEnglishLine":"Loutr, a being from hundreds of years ago, has returned to her original form."},{"lineNumber":262149,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミラクル、なるほど　このような肉塊に変換して保存しておければ時を超えれるのか・・勉強になった","translatedEnglishLine":"Miracle, I see... if you can convert and store it in such a mass of flesh, you can transcend time... I've learned something."},{"lineNumber":262150,"originalJapaneseLine":"　当時の病気はすでに治す魔法が開発されていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, magic to cure the disease had already been developed."},{"lineNumber":262151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※ここ、ミルあたりがそのアイテムを持っていたにしてもいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"*Here, it might be good if someone like Mil had that item."},{"lineNumber":262152,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262153,"originalJapaneseLine":"元に戻ったルートは弟の事を心配している","translatedEnglishLine":"Loutr, now restored, is worried about her younger brother."},{"lineNumber":262154,"originalJapaneseLine":"頭が良くて人をバカにして、困った子、悪さしてないでしょうか？","translatedEnglishLine":"He's clever and mocks others, a troublesome child—has he been causing trouble?"},{"lineNumber":262155,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人になって人類の敵になったよと教えると、びっくりする。","translatedEnglishLine":"When told he became a demon lord and an enemy to humanity, she is surprised."},{"lineNumber":262156,"originalJapaneseLine":"お前が弟のかわりに贖罪しろ","translatedEnglishLine":"You must atone in place of your brother."},{"lineNumber":262157,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界を救う為に戦っている俺をねぎらえ","translatedEnglishLine":"Appreciate me, who is fighting to save the world."},{"lineNumber":262158,"originalJapaneseLine":"とフェラさせます。","translatedEnglishLine":"And makes her perform fellatio."},{"lineNumber":262159,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにパイアールが現れます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Paiarl appears."},{"lineNumber":262160,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが姉を犯しているのを見て激怒、襲ってきます","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing Rance violating his sister, he becomes furious and attacks."},{"lineNumber":262161,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"A battle ensues."},{"lineNumber":262162,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦いの途中でパイアールが気がつく、","translatedEnglishLine":"During the fight, Paiarl realizes,"},{"lineNumber":262163,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tどうして・・ねーちゃんが元に戻っているんだーと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why... is my sister restored?\""},{"lineNumber":262164,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tボクがあれだけ努力して無理だったのに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I tried so hard, but it was impossible for me.\""},{"lineNumber":262165,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tミラクル、方向性の違いだよ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miracle, it's a matter of difference in approach.\""},{"lineNumber":262166,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t君がやろうとしていたのは、神と同じ事を再現しようとした","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What you were trying to do was to replicate what gods do.\""},{"lineNumber":262167,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t私の方は神の力を使って再現した","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I used the power of a god to replicate it.\""},{"lineNumber":262168,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦いの途中でピンチになるとルートを使う","translatedEnglishLine":"When it becomes a crisis in the battle, use Loutr."},{"lineNumber":262169,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tおっと、少し手加減してもらおうか。お前の姉がどーなってもよくないだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oops, why don't you go easy on me a bit? It wouldn't be good if your sister ends up badly.\""},{"lineNumber":262170,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t５ターン何もするな","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do nothing for five turns.\""},{"lineNumber":262171,"originalJapaneseLine":"パイアールはバタリと倒れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Paiarl collapsed with a thud."},{"lineNumber":262172,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルートがあわてて近寄る、えっ・・弟は許してくれるのでは・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Loutr hurriedly approached, \"Huh... Won't my brother forgive me...?\""},{"lineNumber":262173,"originalJapaneseLine":"すまん、ついやっちゃった　てへ","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry, I just went ahead and did it. Teehee."},{"lineNumber":262174,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんかむつくガキだし、力加減が出来なかったわー","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s kind of a brat, so I couldn't hold back my strength."},{"lineNumber":262175,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔血魂は回収","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon blood soul is recovered."},{"lineNumber":262176,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "},{"lineNumber":262177,"originalJapaneseLine":"すると・・ぺこぺこーと音がして、本体の停止を確認、バックアッププログラムを可動します。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then... a 'peko peko' sound is heard, confirming the main body’s shutdown, and the backup program activates."},{"lineNumber":262178,"originalJapaneseLine":"とアナライザーみたいなロボットが動き出す、パイアールの記憶を受け継いだロボだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"An analyzer-like robot starts moving, a robot that inherited Paiarl's memories."},{"lineNumber":262179,"originalJapaneseLine":"機械で記憶を受け継ぐ技術は完成していたのか、すごいすごい","translatedEnglishLine":"The technology to inherit memories mechanically was already completed. Amazing, amazing."},{"lineNumber":262180,"originalJapaneseLine":"以降、パイアール（ロボ）、ルートは仲間に加わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"From now on, Paiarl (robot) and Loutr join the party."},{"lineNumber":262181,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍は敗走","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster army retreats in defeat."},{"lineNumber":262182,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここは何か、それまでに魔物大将軍のシーンなどが必要","translatedEnglishLine":"Something is needed here, like a prior scene with the monster great general."},{"lineNumber":262183,"originalJapaneseLine":"後でうまく調整する事","translatedEnglishLine":"Adjust accordingly later."},{"lineNumber":262184,"originalJapaneseLine":"翔竜山の頂上に到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the summit of Mount Shoryu."},{"lineNumber":262185,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＫＤと出会う","translatedEnglishLine":"Meet KD."},{"lineNumber":262186,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＫＤが宝物の解説","translatedEnglishLine":"KD explains the treasure."},{"lineNumber":262187,"originalJapaneseLine":"均衡状態と滅亡近いピンチ状態の２種類があります。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are two types: a balanced state and a near-extinction crisis state."},{"lineNumber":262188,"originalJapaneseLine":"状況が大きく変わるので条件確認して２種類テキストを入れて下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the situation changes drastically, check conditions and insert two types of text."},{"lineNumber":262189,"originalJapaneseLine":"ナレーション、または、所々、キャラの台詞を入れるなどして説明して下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Please explain with narration or occasionally by characters’ dialogue."},{"lineNumber":262190,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに説明しているというより、ユーザーに分かればいいです","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not so much explaining to Rance as making it clear to the user."},{"lineNumber":262191,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":" "}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案内ロボが現れるが、全然有効的では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A guide robot appears, but it's completely ineffective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入者は排除すると警告していたはずです、警報が鳴り響く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It should have warned that intruders will be eliminated, but the alarm blares loudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場内の廊下を進んでいたが・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was advancing down the factory corridor...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行き止まりだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a dead end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他に道はないか、ちょっと近くの部屋を調べてみろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there no other path? Check a nearby room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにもない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's nothing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ・・しかたない、１階に戻るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch... can't be helped, let's go back to the first floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが肉塊の部屋に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrives at the room with the mass of flesh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先の情報でこの肉塊がパイアールの姉、ルートという事が分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From previous information, it is known that this mass of flesh is Paiarl's sister, Loutr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この肉塊を人質、肉質にとってパイアールを脅迫する訳か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are taking this flesh mass as hostage and blackmailing Paiarl with the person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつにとっては命より大事な物だろうからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For him, it's probably something more important than his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魂は完全に維持されている、すごい事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soul is completely preserved, which is amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが持っていた魔導具ＩＰボディで戻せるかもという（伏線、シィルがコレ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s a possibility of restoring it with the magical device IP Body that Miracle had (foreshadowing, this is the one Seal has).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを使ってルートを再生させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using that, they regenerate Loutr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 病気は治っていないが、元の身体に戻るルート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the illness is not cured, Loutr returns to her original body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何百年前の生命であるルートだが、元に戻った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Loutr, a being from hundreds of years ago, has returned to her original form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクル、なるほど　このような肉塊に変換して保存しておければ時を超えれるのか・・勉強になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle, I see... if you can convert and store it in such a mass of flesh, you can transcend time... I've learned something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時の病気はすでに治す魔法が開発されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, magic to cure the disease had already been developed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここ、ミルあたりがそのアイテムを持っていたにしてもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Here, it might be good if someone like Mil had that item.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元に戻ったルートは弟の事を心配している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Loutr, now restored, is worried about her younger brother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭が良くて人をバカにして、困った子、悪さしてないでしょうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's clever and mocks others, a troublesome child—has he been causing trouble?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人になって人類の敵になったよと教えると、びっくりする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When told he became a demon lord and an enemy to humanity, she is surprised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が弟のかわりに贖罪しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You must atone in place of your brother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を救う為に戦っている俺をねぎらえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Appreciate me, who is fighting to save the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とフェラさせます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And makes her perform fellatio.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにパイアールが現れます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Paiarl appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが姉を犯しているのを見て激怒、襲ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing Rance violating his sister, he becomes furious and attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いの途中でパイアールが気がつく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the fight, Paiarl realizes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして・・ねーちゃんが元に戻っているんだーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why... is my sister restored?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクがあれだけ努力して無理だったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I tried so hard, but it was impossible for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクル、方向性の違いだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Miracle, it's a matter of difference in approach."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君がやろうとしていたのは、神と同じ事を再現しようとした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What you were trying to do was to replicate what gods do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の方は神の力を使って再現した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I used the power of a god to replicate it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いの途中でピンチになるとルートを使う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it becomes a crisis in the battle, use Loutr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっと、少し手加減してもらおうか。お前の姉がどーなってもよくないだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oops, why don't you go easy on me a bit? It wouldn't be good if your sister ends up badly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５ターン何もするな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do nothing for five turns."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールはバタリと倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiarl collapsed with a thud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルートがあわてて近寄る、えっ・・弟は許してくれるのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Loutr hurriedly approached, "Huh... Won't my brother forgive me...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すまん、ついやっちゃった　てへ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, I just went ahead and did it. Teehee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかむつくガキだし、力加減が出来なかったわー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s kind of a brat, so I couldn't hold back my strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂は回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon blood soul is recovered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すると・・ぺこぺこーと音がして、本体の停止を確認、バックアッププログラムを可動します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... a 'peko peko' sound is heard, confirming the main body’s shutdown, and the backup program activates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とアナライザーみたいなロボットが動き出す、パイアールの記憶を受け継いだロボだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An analyzer-like robot starts moving, a robot that inherited Paiarl's memories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機械で記憶を受け継ぐ技術は完成していたのか、すごいすごい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The technology to inherit memories mechanically was already completed. Amazing, amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以降、パイアール（ロボ）、ルートは仲間に加わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, Paiarl (robot) and Loutr join the party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍は敗走
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army retreats in defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは何か、それまでに魔物大将軍のシーンなどが必要
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something is needed here, like a prior scene with the monster great general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後でうまく調整する事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Adjust accordingly later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の頂上に到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the summit of Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＫＤと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meet KD.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＫＤが宝物の解説
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: KD explains the treasure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 均衡状態と滅亡近いピンチ状態の２種類があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two types: a balanced state and a near-extinction crisis state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況が大きく変わるので条件確認して２種類テキストを入れて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the situation changes drastically, check conditions and insert two types of text.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナレーション、または、所々、キャラの台詞を入れるなどして説明して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please explain with narration or occasionally by characters’ dialogue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに説明しているというより、ユーザーに分かればいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not so much explaining to Rance as making it clear to the user.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 案内ロボが現れるが、全然有効的では無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A guide robot appears, but it's completely ineffective.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵入者は排除すると警告していたはずです、警報が鳴り響く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It should have warned that intruders will be eliminated, but the alarm blares loudly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 工場内の廊下を進んでいたが・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was advancing down the factory corridor...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行き止まりだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a dead end.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他に道はないか、ちょっと近くの部屋を調べてみろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is there no other path? Check a nearby room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにもない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's nothing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ・・しかたない、１階に戻るか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch... can't be helped, let's go back to the first floor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが肉塊の部屋に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance arrives at the room with the mass of flesh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先の情報でこの肉塊がパイアールの姉、ルートという事が分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From previous information, it is known that this mass of flesh is Paiarl's sister, Loutr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この肉塊を人質、肉質にとってパイアールを脅迫する訳か
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are taking this flesh mass as hostage and blackmailing Paiarl with the person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつにとっては命より大事な物だろうからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For him, it's probably something more important than his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魂は完全に維持されている、すごい事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soul is completely preserved, which is amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクルが持っていた魔導具ＩＰボディで戻せるかもという（伏線、シィルがコレ）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s a possibility of restoring it with the magical device IP Body that Miracle had (foreshadowing, this is the one Seal has).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを使ってルートを再生させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Using that, they regenerate Loutr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 病気は治っていないが、元の身体に戻るルート
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though the illness is not cured, Loutr returns to her original body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何百年前の生命であるルートだが、元に戻った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Loutr, a being from hundreds of years ago, has returned to her original form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクル、なるほど　このような肉塊に変換して保存しておければ時を超えれるのか・・勉強になった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Miracle, I see... if you can convert and store it in such a mass of flesh, you can transcend time... I've learned something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当時の病気はすでに治す魔法が開発されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, magic to cure the disease had already been developed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ここ、ミルあたりがそのアイテムを持っていたにしてもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Here, it might be good if someone like Mil had that item.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元に戻ったルートは弟の事を心配している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Loutr, now restored, is worried about her younger brother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頭が良くて人をバカにして、困った子、悪さしてないでしょうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's clever and mocks others, a troublesome child—has he been causing trouble?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人になって人類の敵になったよと教えると、びっくりする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When told he became a demon lord and an enemy to humanity, she is surprised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前が弟のかわりに贖罪しろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You must atone in place of your brother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界を救う為に戦っている俺をねぎらえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Appreciate me, who is fighting to save the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とフェラさせます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And makes her perform fellatio.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにパイアールが現れます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Paiarl appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが姉を犯しているのを見て激怒、襲ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing Rance violating his sister, he becomes furious and attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A battle ensues.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いの途中でパイアールが気がつく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: During the fight, Paiarl realizes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして・・ねーちゃんが元に戻っているんだーと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why... is my sister restored?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ボクがあれだけ努力して無理だったのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I tried so hard, but it was impossible for me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミラクル、方向性の違いだよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Miracle, it's a matter of difference in approach."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君がやろうとしていたのは、神と同じ事を再現しようとした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What you were trying to do was to replicate what gods do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の方は神の力を使って再現した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I used the power of a god to replicate it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦いの途中でピンチになるとルートを使う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When it becomes a crisis in the battle, use Loutr.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おっと、少し手加減してもらおうか。お前の姉がどーなってもよくないだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oops, why don't you go easy on me a bit? It wouldn't be good if your sister ends up badly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５ターン何もするな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do nothing for five turns."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パイアールはバタリと倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Paiarl collapsed with a thud.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルートがあわてて近寄る、えっ・・弟は許してくれるのでは・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Loutr hurriedly approached, "Huh... Won't my brother forgive me...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すまん、ついやっちゃった　てへ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sorry, I just went ahead and did it. Teehee.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんかむつくガキだし、力加減が出来なかったわー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s kind of a brat, so I couldn't hold back my strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂は回収
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon blood soul is recovered.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すると・・ぺこぺこーと音がして、本体の停止を確認、バックアッププログラムを可動します。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then... a 'peko peko' sound is heard, confirming the main body’s shutdown, and the backup program activates.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とアナライザーみたいなロボットが動き出す、パイアールの記憶を受け継いだロボだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An analyzer-like robot starts moving, a robot that inherited Paiarl's memories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 機械で記憶を受け継ぐ技術は完成していたのか、すごいすごい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The technology to inherit memories mechanically was already completed. Amazing, amazing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以降、パイアール（ロボ）、ルートは仲間に加わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From now on, Paiarl (robot) and Loutr join the party.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍は敗走
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster army retreats in defeat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは何か、それまでに魔物大将軍のシーンなどが必要
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Something is needed here, like a prior scene with the monster great general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後でうまく調整する事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Adjust accordingly later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翔竜山の頂上に到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the summit of Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＫＤと出会う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meet KD.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＫＤが宝物の解説
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: KD explains the treasure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 均衡状態と滅亡近いピンチ状態の２種類があります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are two types: a balanced state and a near-extinction crisis state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 状況が大きく変わるので条件確認して２種類テキストを入れて下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the situation changes drastically, check conditions and insert two types of text.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナレーション、または、所々、キャラの台詞を入れるなどして説明して下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please explain with narration or occasionally by characters’ dialogue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに説明しているというより、ユーザーに分かればいいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not so much explaining to Rance as making it clear to the user.
